column2: an A.M. Eatery////I came on a Friday morning
column3: and the wait time wasn't too bad. We waited for about 15-20 minutes. Our server was incredible. She was really funny
column4: and she even gave us a complimentary pancake. It was a special that wasn't on the menu
column5: and it was the highlight of our morning. The pancake had some pieces of bacon
column7: and caramel. It was so delicious!
